Package ohos.rpc

Class ReliableFileDescriptor.AutoCloseFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FileInputStream
        • ohos.rpc.ReliableFileDescriptor.AutoCloseFileInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    ReliableFileDescriptor

    public static class ReliableFileDescriptor.AutoCloseFileInputStream
extends FileInputStream
    Represents a file input stream whose file descriptor is automatically closed when this stream is closed.

    This class applies only to operations on the same device.

    Since:
    5
